title: Ardougne cloak 1

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Ardougne cloak 1 is a reward from completing the easy Ardougne Diary given to you by Two-pints in the Flying Horse Inn at East Ardougne, and can be retrieved from her for free if lost.

content:

Ardougne cloak 1

Item ID13121

The Ardougne cloak 1 is a reward from completing the easy Ardougne Diary given to you by Two-pints in the Flying Horse Inn at East Ardougne, and can be retrieved from her for free if lost.

 Attack bonuses
+2+0+0+2+0
 Defence bonuses
+2+0+0+2+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+2List

Benefits[edit | edit source]

At all times When worn When used
  • 200 death runes when trading in a cat to civilians in West Ardougne
  • 10% increased chance to successfully steal from stalls in Ardougne
  • Some drops[e 1] will be noted at the Tower of Life
 N/A
  • Unlimited teleports to the Ardougne Monastery
  1. ^ Eyes of newt, Unicorn horns, and Red spiders' eggs

Teleport Destination[edit | edit source]

A player teleporting to the Ardougne Monastery.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 April 2018
(update)

The "Teleport" option was renamed to "Monastery Teleport".

24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
23 July 2015
(update)
  • The teleport options on the Ardougne cloaks are now in a consistent order.
  • On male characters, the Mime Top's stripes no longer render through the Ardougne cloaks.
16 July 2015
(update)

The dragon chainbody and dragon chainbody (g) no longer render through the Ardougne cloaks.

7 May 2015
(update)

The teleport to the Ardougne monastery has been given graphical update.

[[File:Ardougne cloak 1 detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Ardougne cloak 1''' is a reward from completing the easy [[Ardougne Diary]] given to you by [[Two-pints]] in the [[Flying Horse Inn]] at [[East Ardougne]], and can be retrieved from her for free if lost.

{{Infobox Bonuses
|astab = +2
|aslash = 0

|arange = 0

|dslash = 0

}}

==Benefits==
{|class = "wikitable"
! At all times
! When [[Worn equipment|worn]]
! When [[Choose Option|used]]
|-
|
*200 [[death rune]]s when trading in a [[cat]] to [[Civilian|civilians]] in [[West Ardougne]]
*10% increased chance to successfully [[Thieving|steal]] from [[Stall|stalls]] in [[Ardougne]]
*Some drops{{Refn|[[Eye of newt|Eyes of newt]], [[Unicorn horn|Unicorn horns]], and [[Red spiders' eggs]]|group = e}} will be [[Bank note|noted]] at the [[Creature Creation|Tower of Life]]
|{{NA}}
|
*Unlimited [[Teleportation|teleports]] to the [[Ardougne Monastery]]
|-
|}
{{Reflist|group = e}}

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 12 April 2018
|update = Quality of Life Improvements
|change = The "Teleport" option was renamed to "Monastery Teleport".
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 24 March 2016
|update = White & Black Graceful
|poll = Old School Content Poll 40: Vanilla LootShare & QoL
|change = 
*It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
*The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 23 July 2015
|update = Big Cats & WWF 
|change = 
*The teleport options on the [[Ardougne cloak]]s are now in a consistent order.
*On male characters, the [[Mime Top]]'s stripes no longer render through the [[Ardougne cloak]]s.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 16 July 2015
|update = Duel Arena Rework
|change = The [[dragon chainbody]] and [[dragon chainbody (g)]] no longer render through the Ardougne cloaks.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 7 May 2015
|update = Slayer Partners & Teleports
|change = The teleport to the Ardougne monastery has been given [[graphical updates|graphical update]].
}}
